original_definition: 'Implementing measures' means measures adopted pursuant to this Directive laying down ecodesign requirements for defined products or for environmental aspects thereof;
generated_definition: 'Implementing measures' means implementing measures are measures that are necessary to give effect to the ecodesign requirements laid down in annex i and/or annex ii. they may also provide that no ecodesign requirement is necessary for certain specified ecodesign parameters referred to in annex i, part 1.
